feed.title: Prowlarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.33.3.5008
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 6be4203b4134f4c47d08659110cf11e83c85c945 Automated API Docs update
  • 1339373e4344c0d6988f85fd1fb683eabfb0a58e Bump Selenium.WebDriver.ChromeDriver
  • fc9dfb0cf7e41a029a92a1f60e2ca109bb2bff3a Fixed: Disallow tags creation with empty label
  • 48301055eae8f7efd24dbfdcd1a2b20637f1a506 Fixed: Set output encoding to UTF-8 when running external processes
  • 8a9518c9c164f0c803b7f7bde6483bf12555f380 Update WikiUrl type in API docs
  • de099c6770ae96b12eadd48c1329b05d26568c77 Log delete statements only once
  • 07711da4e090887eb6540d77d05bc3d3d9d2bc29 Bump version to 1.33.3
  • 7cb70716d040e1e5d00c060f05adb416805bae62 Fixed: (NorBits) Change encoding to UTF8 (#2367)
  • 548dedad5c285a407c4bfe79c2f3e4d2f3496606 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 700862635823004f5abce0845931cfa3068b7a46 Fixed: (PassThePopcorn) Parse volume factors for neutral leech releases
See More * f6f2a3b00d0c3986f11078deb804e89480f812ff Bump linux agent to ubuntu-22.04 * 2b16d93095844ad6a867cfa69042f7398c9f442c Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * e63ee13d236d2931fa9ded36cb0e3c2e7374a0e4 Bump version to 1.33.2 * 5c5a163151e6c3c69c9466df5792e6c072c3b457 Fixed: (AnimeBytes) Allow season searching for ONA * 023eec0ec062a0e1fac3c45907fdcf1e2222125e Update timezone offset for PrivateHD and CinemaZ * 5bc5f0e6b8218b6dd3da2ddb342e8a5e7370a52e New: Categories, genres, indexer flags and publish dates for webhook releases * 5cbacc01eb83531eaf0aa19b0a665b1b6d73eb0c Fixed: Publish dates timezone in history details for grabbed releases * f4f1b38324e9351c8c96cf231333203579694b30 New: On Grab notifications for CustomScript * 758dddd4ad8261a9c948303d4d5811676496e1e6 Bump version to 1.33.1 * 73ee69563372dc57ed7eba8bb7c05f338319d1f3 New: (BeyondHD) Parsing audio and subtitles languages * 27fbd7ef7e7ad8876a744a8bf147549549182a6e Fixed: (RuTracker.org) Improve subtitles removal * 5125f256fb8c20b902adafe16530c4792a580d87 Fixed: Priority validation for indexers and download clients * b99e8d0d65217e5085db1b0e6a539d6ae6e54af9 Improve logging when login fails due to CryptographicException * d20b2cc9c01b9d98f8a6b77fbb617e0e74901cc9 Bump NLog and Polly * 8a1787bdb6c8e733e79d5a0999230d99f7ac2a79 Bump version to 1.33.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=181&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.34.1.5021
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 0322d70d6342af8437257986e5c2666564625e6c Fixed: Handle 307 and 308 redirects for indexer download requests
  • 362f3fe22382220ec1478c8f2eef4c6a0e847d63 Bump version to 1.34.1
  • 075fd24f96b7759b6459529a1c252f2e62aa5132 Downgrade Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities
  • 4ba72ea7f3e00cd63e1265e1e35ffc25b7d8f3dc Bump Swashbuckle to 7.3.2
  • 46f73c51bb4402094d31d8c71c0a964252e2bedf Bump IPAddressRange, Npgsql, System.Text.Json
  • 3287d45661bdbb392777c53f5395a45c8cb28ef9 Update timezone offset for AvistaZ trackers
  • 71937fa44c71d51a7262edaf92ad7e76f85638c4 Update timezone offset for FL
  • 6aefd46cd45544c7509c221b7395bb569fc2720a Fixed: (SecretCinema) Edition not being decoded
  • c8370c9e00a545ab6b713dae486fd8e1721aaa28 Bump version to 1.34.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.35.1.5034
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • c61cfcd312c7744358a28074e4408fa3cb0cebf3 Avoid logging the whole response in the exception when not finding JSON selectors in Cardigann
  • 5eb4d112cacde8bcd93f3d733a13ea48592b0dbb Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 70f2361d6930fc61e2d7c4c491c1172a124e2648 Improve messaging when NZB contains invalid XML
  • 1d6babaa15d2ef3d085e9ccec4d84839b0d53635 Bump caniuse db
  • 0427add8d064a2770b5167dfae515990c9fa7d85 Bump core-js to 3.41
  • 010c2b836de7d2c0a197e017977417aa3eff4d93 Clean up formatted strings in log messages
  • 22c4c1fc9a05487dfc2dfebd7bb5da88911eae7d Pass messages with arguments to NLog in LoggerExtensions
  • d5f6cc94b8cf30f079d2b73a5e1cce82a6007efa Fixed: (PTP) TV search capabilities removed
  • 411e96ef2a9d585f2bca651f7e1ebab270432aae New: Redirect enabled by default when adding new usenet indexers
  • 2b0e52ebca191b574df4a9a5c9525de127b77b57 Update default log level message
See More * c6fa26ca7b09229029d7917bd6b50b6ddd49d6c0 Bump version to 1.35.1 * c85f170d4174320ae6501dc1c74b74c6643182ef Bump license year * 48a658571bdecda1d6a94b77876afb84346bdf5e Improve error messaging for not finding JSON selectors in Cardigann * 0b3a5c9bc41f5fa550bb487e9ac661496aa64b63 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 356d07ef3405aab357f9216d5abe30f7819c854e Bump version to 1.35.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=186&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.36.3.5071
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • c3ee3f2320c6638c6d5aaf88e417ba4f5fe3edd6 Fix jump to character for Search page

  • 40d2e40d9413aa47c120255698dc8f7b12a2ff8c Fail build on missing test results
  • 837f50c91c51bba84a6699bc65f503f631e856a8 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

  • 5ed82eaf09ef7e7bf49b0e885bec2d8db5821811 Fixed: (PTP) Download torrent files with API credentials
  • 7d77ad68fdfa367d0ce9ebe299805a94ac48ad95 Bump caniuse db
  • 6725358db58ef9a732f0d5474014babe75da6f6d Bump babel, fontawesome icons, react-use-measure, react-virtualized and react-window

To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)
